extensionDescription.message: Confirm mailaddress and attachments based on flexible rules.

confirmMultipleRecipientDomainsTitle.message: Multiple recipient domains in To or Cc

confirmMultipleRecipientDomainsMessage.message:
There are multiple recipient domains in To or Cc.

$DOMAINS$

All recipients information will be disclosed to all other recipients. Do you really want to send this message?

confirmAttentionDomainsMessage.message:
These recipients with attention domains are found:

$RECIPIENTS$

If there is no problem, continue to send.

confirmAttentionSuffixesMessage.message:
These attachments with attention extensions are found:

$ATTACHMENTS$

If there is no problem, continue to send.

configs_confirmInternalMail_label.message: Skip confirmation if all recipients are internals

configs_minConfirmationRecipientsCount_l.message: Skip confirmation if there are/is only

configs_confirmMultipleRecipientDomains_.message: Confirm when there are multiple domains in To/Cc recipients

configs_allowCheckAllInternals_label.message: Allow to make all internal recipients to be checked with one checkbox

configs_allowCheckAllExternals_label.message: Allow to make all foreign recipients to be checked with one checkbox

configs_attentionDomains_caption.message: Specially alerted foreign domains in recipients

configs_attentionDomainsHighlightMode_wi.message: Only when there is any attachment

configs_attentionDomainsConfirmationMode.message: Re-confirmation when there is any recipient with one of these domains
Only when there is any attachment

configs_attentionDomainsSourceFile_label.message: Use a list given as a file

configs_exceptionalSuffixesConfirm_label.message: Confirm me again before send, if there is any attachment with one of these extensions in a message to foreign domains

configs_exceptionalSuffixesContirmFile_l.message: Use a list given as a file

configs_requireReinputAttachmentNames_la.message: Require to input file names of attachments, if there is any other domain recipient

configs_allowCheckAllAttachments_label.message: All to control checkboxes under the "&confirm.dialog.fileName_label;" section

configs_countdownAllowSkip_label.message: Allow to skip countdown to send the mail immediately

configs_requireCheckBody_label.message: Require to check the message body

configs_largeFontSizeForAddresses_label.message: Show addresses with larget font size

configs_alwaysLargeDialog_label.message: Open confirmation dialog with large size always

configs_topMessage_label.message: Top Message of the confirmation dialog:
